title: Constant Returns to Scale in Perfect Competition

content.question: Assume that all firms in a perfectly competitive market currently earn positive economic profits. What will happen in the long run if all firms face constant returns to scale in production?

choices.label: The price of the product will increase.
The quantity produced by each existing firm will decrease.
Average total cost of production will increase.

content.answer: The quantity produced by each existing firm will decrease.

unit.text: 3: Production, Cost, and the Perfect Competition Model

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Determine the outcome of an economic situation using economic concepts, principles, or models.
